Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 3: Complete SIP client ESP-IDF port with verbose logging

SIP Client Features:
- Full SIP REGISTER/INVITE/CANCEL/BYE implementation
- Digest authentication with Fritz!Box
- NVS persistence for credentials and settings
- Deferred ring execution \(avoids stack overflow in HTTP handlers\)
- Auto-registration on boot with 60s refresh interval
- Verbose logging toggle for debugging SIP packet content

Web Interface:
- SIP feature toggle in Core Features \(persists to NVS\)
- Verbose logging toggle on /sip page
- /sipDebug endpoint with registration status
- /api/sip/verbose GET/POST endpoints
- Silent /capture handler \(prevents 404 spam\)

API Endpoints:
- GET/POST /api/features - feature toggle states
- GET/POST /api/sip - SIP configuration
- POST /api/sip/ring - trigger ring \(deferred\)
- GET/POST /api/sip/verbose - verbose logging control
- GET /sipDebug - SIP debug status JSON

Architecture:
- Moved sip_client to src_idf/components/sip_client/
- Static buffers to minimize stack usage
- Uses gateway IP for SIP proxy \(avoids DNS stack usage\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
